page.title: 18Clubs in Muckhart.
page.content: As this is a rural area, most clubs are run by local people.The Coronation Hall which is owned by the village is often the meeting place.The SWRI hold monthly meetings.A Youth club is held weekly. There is a Horticultural Society with an annual show.The Amenity Society takes care of the preservation of the character of the village and countryside.A Ski club enables young and old to take part in this exciting sport.All these clubs have Muckhart in their titles but welcome many from outlying districts. There is also an 18 hole golf club.
